chapter.text: By the brightness of the day
and the night when it darkens
Your Lord has neither forsaken you nor does he hate you
And surely the latter period (future) will be better for you than the former (past)
And surely you will be given (so much) by your Lord that you will be pleased
Did He not find you an orphan, then give you shelter
and find you wandering then guide you
and find you poor then make you free of want
So as for the orphan do not oppress (him)
and as for the beggar do not drive him away
and as for the favour of your Lord, do proclaim
